the discovery of oil. The discovery of oil in commercial quantity in 1956, and the subsequent exploitation of the resource, has had a profound effect on the country’s economy, politics, and society. The discovery of oil has been a blessing and a curse to Nigeria. It has been a blessing because it has provided the country with a source of revenue that has enabled it to develop its infrastructure and provide social amenities to its citizens. However, it has also been a curse because it has led to the exploitation of the country’s resources by foreign companies, and the exploitation of the country’s people by the government. The discovery of oil in Nigeria has had a profound effect on the country’s economy, politics, and society.
